title: Sand
description: My heart raced. I had been waiting for this moment for 27 years.  Four minutes and twenty-three seconds. I checked myself over in my tiny overhead car mirror. My green eyes emphasized by the black eye liner and mascara I had applied before the hour and five-minute drive to our halfway point. One minute and twenty-eight seconds. A Meet Date only happened once in a lifetime, and this was my moment.
author: H.K. Fletcher
